mapper.select: SELECT C.HEALTH_FUN_FOOD_NUM, C.PROD_PIC, C.COM_NM, C.PROD_NM, C.SHAPE_PIC FROM(SELECT HFF.HEALTH_FUN_FOOD_NUM, HFF.PROD_PIC, CN.COM_NM, HFF.PROD_NM, SH.SHAPE_PIC, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY HEALTH_FUN_FOOD_NUM DESC) AS RNUM FROM HEALTH_FUN_FOOD HFF INNER JOIN COM_NM CN ON HFF.COM_NUM = CN.COM_NUM INNER JOIN SHAPE SH ON HFF.SHAPE_NUM = SH.SHAPE_NUM WHERE HFF.DEL_D IS NULL AND (HFF.PROD_NM LIKE '%' || #{searchbox} || '%' OR CN.COM_NM LIKE '%' || #{searchbox} || '%'))C WHERE C.RNUM BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM HEALTH_FUN_FOOD HFF INNER JOIN COM_NM CN ON HFF.COM_NUM = CN.COM_NUM WHERE HFF.DEL_D IS NULL AND (HFF.PROD_NM LIKE '%' || #{searchbox} || '%' OR CN.COM_NM LIKE '%' || #{searchbox} || '%')
SELECT HFF.HEALTH_FUN_FOOD_NUM, HFF.PROD_PIC, CN.COM_NM, HFF.PROD_NM FROM HEALTH_FUN_FOOD HFF INNER JOIN COM_NM CN ON HFF.COM_NUM = CN.COM_NUM WHERE HFF.HEALTH_FUN_FOOD_NUM = #{healthFunFoodNum}
SELECT HFF.HEALTH_FUN_FOOD_NUM, SHAPE.SHAPE_PIC FROM HEALTH_FUN_FOOD HFF INNER JOIN SHAPE SHAPE ON HFF.SHAPE_NUM = SHAPE.SHAPE_NUM WHERE HFF.HEALTH_FUN_FOOD_NUM = #{healthFunFoodNum}

SELECT HFF.HEALTH_FUN_FOOD_NUM, FUNC.PIC FROM HEALTH_FUN_FOOD_FUNC_MID HFFFM INNER JOIN HEALTH_FUN_FOOD HFF ON HFFFM.HEALTH_FUN_FOOD_NUM = HFF.HEALTH_FUN_FOOD_NUM INNER JOIN FUNC ON HFFFM.FUNC_NUM = FUNC.FUNC_NUM WHERE HFF.HEALTH_FUN_FOOD_NUM = #{healthFunFoodNum}

SELECT HFFNM.HEALTH_FUN_FOOD_NUM, NUT.NUT_NM, NUT.MIN_PROP_TAKE_AMT, NUT.MAX_PROP_TAKE_AMT, HFFNM.FIG, UNIT.UNIT FROM HEALTH_FUN_FOOD_NUT_MID HFFNM INNER JOIN NUT NUT ON HFFNM.NUT_NUM = NUT.NUT_NUM INNER JOIN UNIT UNIT ON UNIT.UNIT_NUM = NUT.UNIT_NUM WHERE HFFNM.HEALTH_FUN_FOOD_NUM = #{healthFunFoodNum}
